Compact smoothed stress field

Source: R/interpolation.R
compact_grid.Rd

Filter smoothed stress field to smallest wavelength (R) for each coordinate

Usage

compact_grid(x)

Arguments

x

output of stress2grid() or PoR_stress2grid()

Value

sf object

Examples

data("san_andreas")
res <- stress2grid(san_andreas)
compact_grid(res)
